text: Daniel Vischer (16 January 1950 - 17 January 2017) was a Swiss politician for the Green Party. He was a member of the National Council from 2003 to 2015. (archived) Vischer was born in Basel. He was the son of jurist Frank Vischer (1923-2015). He was married and had two children. Vischer died from cancer on 17 January 2017, a day after his 67th birthday, in ZÃ¼rich. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Switzerland Category:Politicians from Basel
title: Daniel Vischer
